TopicTitle: Mk2 inline docking port control from here not working

Articles.Content:
I've built a spaceplane using the Mk2 Cockpit and clamp-o-tron and whenever the docking port is set as the control point it is in the exact same direction as the cockpit but flipped 180° along the roll axis, as opposed to pointing out to the zenith of the vessel. Here is a link to two screenshots showing the vessel with the two control points. Here is a mostly comprehensive list of mods I have installed.
